column5: Hey all, Im pumped. I caught my first pike in 14 years yesterday. Was fishing for bass but he hit my top water frog.  He wasn't the biggest pike in the world but he sure was fun. Take a peek.    Its 5:14 am here and Im about to go and hit the water again.  Be back with more pics soon
hehe... Its a PERSONAL BEST!  hehehe... Now I'm betting you're aching to catch a 35"+.....Nice fish! I caught my 1st ever pike earlier this year too!
caught 3 more this morning, lost the lure I caught them all with though on a bigger one lol. Going to Canadian Tire to replace the lure.

hey guys got my first Pike ever last week on Baptiste, (actually my first fish ever on Baptiste) about 18" long, wish I had a pic to share future son in law didn't know how to use the camera    and I had trouble with hook so once I got it out I wanted to get him back into the water.
I belive they call that a snot rocket, Nice first
Where are you from. I would like to come and fish for some pike w/ ya..lol  Good photos in the pic.the.fish site. I just sing up and posted some photos to....
Where the pics you promised dude?!

If you start targetting them, you would be well advised to use a 80lb fluorocarbon leader with appropriate snaps and swivels.  After being bitten off with 30lb and then 50lb braid like it was cotton candy, I started using the fluoro and haven't been broken yet(fingers crossed).  Cheers,  Mark
Just got back from Canadian Tire, got the lure and a few more like it, here are some pics from this morning. Was a nice overcast day on the water, gogt off 5 mins before a down pour :D:D
Good advice thats for sure, second time one has snapped my line.
What was the weapon of choice? I just got back from CT and picked up a few of my fav's!

It was the same lure as the other day. Heres a pic, you can find it at canadian tire but I cant find it anywhere online.    Here is a pic of one very similar, but the one I was using had a single hook through the bottom.
Good going hoot33 Got to love catching pike on top water Thanks for sharing Leechman

Ya I really didnt think they'd be hitting it as hard as they were but in 6-8 ft of water it was working amazing, I was fishing for bass to be honest, but as soon as I noticed the pike striking I figured wth why not lol
LOL... I love topwater pike...  Monique caught this one last year...      and this ones even bigger!!!!!
nice fish, especially the one in the video lol
